attributes.action: look into what is happening to the country and take action - to give someone a criminal record for an overfull bin, the country must have gone mad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time the Prime Minister got involved with such matters and put a stop to such actions and bring in some common sense into our lives

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
